dmca.title: Salomon complains again about Hilton video
dmca.body:
FOURTH NOTICE
Via Signed Facsimile to [private] and Via email to [private]@google.com 
December 8, 2005 1:55 AM (California Time)
re: Continued Contributory Copyright Infringement by Google 

Dear [private]:

You've already had more than 24 hours since my first notice (see below). I note that the Infringing Sites are still returned on the Google Search delineated below!

Pursuant to Sections 512 (c) (3) and 512 (d) (3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
